title: Iride STAC Extension
description: An extension defining additional metadata fields for STAC items for the Italian IRIDE space mission

allOf.$comment: This is the schema for STAC Items.

iride:acquisition_id.description: Unique identifier of the acquisition assigned by the CMP to a datatake within the request

iride:instrument_mode.description: Specifies the instrument mode for Optical (Multispectral/Hyperspectral) acquisitions.

iride:observation_direction.description: Direction of observation (e.g., 'left', 'right') for Optical (Multispectral/Hyperspectral) acquisitions.

iride:frame_position.description: Position of the scene frame relative to the total number of frames in the parent datatake.

iride:number_of_frames.description: Total number of frames (nominal scene size) in the parent datatake (typically a strip).

iride:acquisition_subtype.description: Enriches the acquisition classification (e.g., the type of calibration acquisition)

iride:calval_flag.description: Unique identifier of the CalVal flag used in the IPS

iride:orbit_determination.description: Type (or configuration) of orbital data (e.g., Downlinked, Filtered)
